data.name: Accident Mitigation for Truck Fleets
data.description: Built big-data solutions analyzing telemetry with HiveQL & Spark, identifying accident-prone scenarios. Created predictive models for fleet safety.

data.name: Automated Metrics & Analytics Dashboard
data.description: Developed a scalable ETL pipeline using Snowflake and AWS EMR/Redshift for data aggregation. Built interactive dashboards for real-time insights.

data.name: Intelligent Log Monitoring & Alert System
data.description: Real-time log ingestion with AWS Lambda & Kinesis. Deployed anomaly detection alerts, reducing operational downtime by 20%.

data.name: Comprehensive Trading Platform (Qi-Cap)
data.description: Designed a microservices-based terminal for high-frequency trading. Integrated real-time heatmaps, IV curves, and consolidated orders for low-latency performance.

data.name: Company-Specific NLP Chatbot
data.description: NLP-driven chatbot to answer queries from user-uploaded PDFs. Utilizes advanced text classification and retrieval for domain-specific Q&A.
